title: Can relativistic mass raise the gravity generated by a body? Can a body raise its kinetic energy without raising motion (like a person trying to push a wall)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, if the kinetic energy wasn't raised, how come if the wall would be removed he would move without any additional effort ? Maybe he is moving slightly and the wall is also moving slightly, but even if would push forever the wall would still stay put because it springs back
